update.description:
List of modifications:

* Use full namespace for common
* Empty definitions for GaussiaNoisemodel class
* Update gtest to 1.8.1
* Use IGN\_PI instead of M\_PI
* Visibility for sensors and fixes for std::accumulate
* Final fixes: near/far is a reserved word

**Important:** there were some missing definitions in different class methods. I added a fake definition in the .hh header but probably the design intention was other. Please check them.

Tested here:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_sensors-pr-win&build=10)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_sensors-pr-win/10/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-pr-win/10/))
update.title: Windows fixes to make ign-sensor to compile

pullrequest.title: Windows fixes to make ign-sensor to compile

content.raw:
I’ve also removed some ugly definitions [ee518d1](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/commits/ee518d10d5fc72bc1e43905fc0d601ac149b54b4?at=default) that were not the fix for the visibility problems and did not have too much sense. Let’s way for the CI but I’m happy with changes now.

Testing: 

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_sensors-pr-win&build=11)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_sensors-pr-win/11/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_sensors-pr-win/11/))

content.raw: It is related to the migration from Gazebo, some features weren’t supported in another ign libraries. I think we should decide if something of that is worth implement and create issues from there and remove the ones that clearly are not going to be used.
content.html: It is related to the migration from Gazebo, some features weren’t supported in another ign libraries. I think we should decide if something of that is worth implement and create issues from there and remove the ones that clearly are not going to be used.
